Articles.Content: Well, I just posted something like this in the say hello thread up above, but I'm going to make a thread and advertise the KSP Roleplay every chance I get. If you don't know me, I am the former CEO of ThunderBirds Interplanetary Transport, my failed craft company that nobody really liked. I made one of these last... August? I forget. But, here is the shameless advert for the KSPRP: http://play.kerbalroleplay.com/

Welcome back halocon

We probably won't see roleplay back on the forums anytime soon, twice was enough, but I hope you have fun at play.kerbalroleplay.com/

have fun pretending to be a Kerbal, and fly safe!

You stole Scott Manley's words...
